data.title: Signatories — WRITERS AGAINST THE WAR ON GAZA
data.meta_site_name: WRITERS AGAINST THE WAR ON GAZA
data.text:
Below is a full list of signatories to the Writers Against the War on Gaza Statement of Solidarity, published on October 26, 2023.

To read the letter, click here.

To add your name, in solidarity, click here.
